header.title: VideoSum.AI User Guide
header.description: Save time and quickly grasp video content with advanced AI summarization technology

guide1.title: Summarize YouTube Videos
guide1.description: How to summarize videos from YouTube or other video platforms
guide1.step1: Copy the video URL from YouTube, Vimeo, or other video platforms
guide1.step2: Paste the URL into the input field on the summary page
guide1.step3: Select the summary language (English or Vietnamese)
guide1.step4: Click the 'Summarize Video' button and wait for processing
guide1.step5: View the video summary with extracted key points

guide2.title: Summarize Uploaded Videos
guide2.description: How to summarize video files already on your device
guide2.step1: Click the 'Upload Video File' button on the summary page
guide2.step2: Select the video file (supports MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV...)
guide2.step3: Choose the summary language and desired detail level
guide2.step4: Click 'Start Summary' and wait for processing to complete
guide2.step5: View the video summary with key points and timestamps

guide3.title: Using Advanced Features
guide3.description: Customize advanced settings for more suitable summary results
guide3.step1: Open the 'Advanced Settings' menu on the summary page
guide3.step3: Select summary style (overview, key-points focused, analytical)
guide3.step4: Add keywords for AI to focus on specific topics
guide3.step5: Enable important image extraction from video (Premium)

guide4.title: Managing and Sharing Summaries
guide4.description: How to store, share, and publish your video summaries
guide4.step1: Log in to your VideoSum.AI account
guide4.step2: Access 'My Library' page to view all created summaries
guide4.step3: Use the 'Share' button to send summaries via email or social media
guide4.step4: Click 'Download' to save summaries as PDF or text
guide4.step5: Embed summaries in your website or blog using embed code (Premium)

timeSaver.title: Save Time with VideoSum.AI
timeSaver.description: VideoSum.AI users save an average of 90% of video viewing time. Summarizing a 30-minute video takes just seconds.

tips.title: Helpful Tips
tips.guide1: For YouTube videos, you can focus on summarizing a specific section by adding start and end times.
tips.guide2: Customize summary detail based on video length. Videos longer than 1 hour should be summarized at the 'Overview' level.
tips.guide3: Use keywords to guide the AI to focus on specific topics important to you in the video.
tips.guide4: Export summaries to Google Docs or Notion for easy integration into your current workflow.

q1.question: 1. What types of videos work with VideoSum.AI?
q1.answer: VideoSum.AI can summarize most types of videos with spoken content, including lectures, webinars, podcasts, news, etc. The system supports multiple languages.

q2.question: 2. Are video summaries accurate?
q2.answer: VideoSum.AI uses advanced AI technology to ensure high accuracy. However, best results are achieved with videos that have clear audio and minimal background noise.

q3.question: 3. Is my video data safe?
q3.answer: We value your privacy. Uploaded videos are only used to create summaries and will be deleted after 24 hours, unless you choose to save them to your personal library.

q4.question: 4. How do I get a Premium account?
q4.answer: You can upgrade to a Premium account from the account settings page. The Premium package offers many advanced features and unlimited video summaries.
